text: hamane manushy ko apane maan-baap ke saath achchha vyavahaar karane kee taakeed kee. usakee maan ne use (pet mein) takaleef ke saath uthae rakha aur use jana bhee takaleef ke saath. aur usake garbh kee avastha mein rahane aur doodh chhudaane kee avadhi tees maah hai, yahaan tak ki jab vah apanee pooree shakti ko pahuncha aur chaalees varsh ka hua to usane kaha, "ai mere rab! mujhe sambhaal ki main teree us anukampa ke prati krtagyata dikhaoon, jo tune mujhapar aur mere maan-baap par kee hai. aur yah ki main aisa achchha karm karoon jo tujhe priy ho aur mere lie meree santati mein bhalaee rakh de. main tere aage tauba karata hoon aur main muslim (aagyaakaaree) hoon.
